text: Bhai tu bhot mast banda h! You are always cool, positive and energetic. You always have a nice smile on your face and tere se baat kr k genuinely maja aata. My project partner, lab partner, gossip partner and the guy sitting with me in the very few classes I attended, I really enjoyed your company. Wishing you all the success and happiness in your life. See ya soon!
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Anant bhai! You are such a wonderful person! Tere bolne ka style kafi unique h, really like that tone. There have been so many memories with you right from beginning and tu bhot chill insaan h yar. Missed you a lot in the last one month when we were in the campus. Wish you all the best for future and may all your dreams come true. Jald hi milte h! Cheers!
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Chandra bro, seems like we haven‚Äôt talked much but you will always be my good friend and bhai to tu h hi mera. We do share some good moments like tekken khelna, parties and tere ko vote kr k GenSec banana.xD We were playing cricket that day. Mast banda h tu and I hope we meet again soon as we got one more year for completing dual.
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Bhai tu bhot hi bakchod insaan h. You are literally good for everything, quantum physics solve krna ho ya antaragni ko lead karna ho, you can do them with ease. Maja aaya tere aur saini k saath project kar k, phy lab me apan bhot maje krte the, missing those days. Let's hope college wale waps bula le and meet you soon.
author: Naman  Roshan

text: MBA663, right? I am so glad we did it together and enjoyed the stand up by the prof and became good friends. And bro last month would have been difficult without you, as we were probably the only non-smokers among them.xD I really enjoyed the last one month, and tu mera wingie hi ban gaya tha in that month. We played a countless number of computer games, Tekken, Rocket League, Injustice (which you didn‚Äôt like much), basketball match almost everyday and a lot of amazing stuffs. I even went for Taekwondo with you, although 1 din bad sports facilities band ho gayi.xD You are a wonderful person and an amazing artist. Wishing you all the success and happiness in your life. See ya soon!
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Hii Soneria, I always liked your presence. You are a very energetic and positive guy. I am so glad we got to know each other and I really liked hanging out with you in the last month. You almost made me addicted to the MaMa Mio Hot Coffee. xD I wish success follow you all your life and your dreams come true. See ya soon!
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Bro bhot mast insaan h tu. I still remember jab ham first time PE ground me mile the and you came to me and said tu ‚ÄúIISER Kolkata me KVPY camp me tha na‚Äù. Although I didn‚Äôt recognize you that time but after that you are always an amazing friend of mine. Rendezvous me jana, antaragni me hangout karna, tere sath bhot saare wonderful experiences h. And kya chaapa bhai, IIMA! All the best for your future goals and meet you soon!
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Let‚Äôs begin with a wave! xD Hiii Chitranshi! Whenever me meet, there is one thing that is always common and it‚Äôs you saying ‚Äú Tu itna gora kaise hote ja raha h‚Äù! You are an amazing person, summers was great and you being one of the reasons. Bhot enjoy kiya tha hamne and I‚Äôm pretty sure Pond wala incident tu bhuli nahi hogi. xD And meri koi bandi nahi h, tu first year summers se hi puch rahi h. Wishing you all the success and happiness in your life. Stay in touch.
author: Naman  Roshan

text:
Bro we do have infinitely many memories together and the best thing is I can‚Äôt think of a single bad one. First year se hi hamne bhot saare games khele h, we even had the same controller.xD And then the summer sports camp was amazing, mess toh seriously bhot sahi tha, pta ni Nimbu Pani k kitne glasses piye honge hamne. From going to BBQ, Shopping,Parties, Movies, hanging out in the campus, I really enjoyed your company and all the memories are still fresh. College ka last year to almost miss hi ho gaya, but the memories of that one month can definitely compensate for the whole year. Yaar kitne maje kiye hamne, we almost never slept in the night during those days. And wo Kachori wala incident, that I can never forget in my life.xD Tere sath basketball bhi bhot khela h and tu pro player to h hi, definitely learnt a lot from you.  You are an amazing and a very genuine person, wish you good health and lots of happiness in life. See you soon. 

P.S: Our SnapChat streak is 866 today. üòâ
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Harshit bro!!!!!! I can literally fill your entire yearbook page alone but I‚Äôm kind enough not to do so.  Bhai tu hamesha mere room k adjacent wale room me hi raha h and we have knocked each other‚Äôs room countless times, from going to canteen, watching wwe, movies, anime, web series, playing games and even predicting wrestlemania lineups, we do share infinitely many beautiful memories. We missed you a lot in the campus, although it lasted only for a month. You are an amazing guy bro, very hard working, dedicated and an amazing sportsperson, you are good at almost every sport. The only thing you lack is your interest in girls, do give it a try on Urzica man!! Wish you all the best for your future and I am pretty sure tu Microsoft me bhi apne colleagues k phone pe spy karna nahi chorega.xD I have missed a lot of things but yeah, we will discuss when we meet. See ya soon.
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Bro you are a very decent guy and I really admire your basketball shoots. Bhot maza aaya tere sath khel k and tu hamesha ready rahta tha khelne k liye. Wish you achieve all your goals and stay blessed!
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Kevlin bro tu dil ka bhot accha insaan h. I won‚Äôt be wrong if I say you care for others more than you care for yourself sometimes. Tere sath bhot saari memories h right from the beginning of the college, tu nahi hota toh I would have missed so many labs for sure. Tere sath cricket khel k and IPL matches dekh k bhot maza aaya and tere room me bhot saari deep conversations ki h humne (You,Me,Vishal,Sajal). All those memories are still fresh. Jald hi milte h and if things get back to normal, then may be a trip would be great! You are definitely one of a kind! Wish you all the best for your future goals and I am sure you will do great! Cya soon!
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Bhai tu bhot mast insaan h! I‚Äôm a bit surprised why we didn‚Äôt interact much in the first year but thankfully we became good friends later and last month me toh bhai kitne maze kiye h, unlimited fun moments. We watched each and every IPL match together, played basketball almost everyday, unlimited Tekken matches and a lot of other stuffs. A hardcore Mumbai Indians fan, and by the way tune apna MI wala ringtone change kr k ‚ÄúTere Liye‚Äù kiya ya ni? Undoubtedly, you play all the sports well, tu mjhe TT me bhi hara deta tha with that racket.xD And I still remember the moment when you sipped alcohol (JD) for the first time, bs ek sip k bad tujhe chakkar aa raha tha. xD  Keep enjoying your life and stay blessed! Jald hi milte h!
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Bro, memoir me kya hi likhu! We do talk to each other almost everyday about everything, cricket, cryptos, rcb vs kkr ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs endless. Bhot accha dost h tu mera and you are really a very nice person. I think we have never stopped talking since the day we met and we do share a lot of memories together. I‚Äôm glad tu dual kr raha h and I hope they call us back to the campus soon. Acche se GSoC kar and then we really need to focus more on our coding skills.xD Wish you all the best for your ambitions and meet you soon.
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Nupur, you are a delightful person and I can trust you for anything. Glad we met in the TT summer camp and I really liked playing TT with you coz those were easy wins. xD You have always been nice to me and I really liked the time we spent together. Wishing you all the success and happiness in your life. You have explained a lot to me about your meaning of happiness, remember? Thank you for being my constant. Stay Blessed! See you soon!
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Hi bro! You are one of the nicest persons I have ever met. Tere sath Antaragni me hangout kr k bhot maza aaya. It is always pleasant to meet you and tere se bhot hi positive vibes aati h. Wish you good health and may all your dreams come true. Stay in touch and meet you soon.
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Bro tere se jyada disciplined insaan shyad hi koi hoga. You have always been a good friend of mine right from the day we met. And by the way, you always had something for me to eat whenever I came to your room after the canteen was closed. And tera coffee collection bhi amazing tha, really loved that. We had a lot discussions about almost everything and everytime we ended up having an out of box startup idea.xD Tune basketball me bhot trouble kiya h, defended so many perfect shoots of mine.xD And mjhe ek br tujhe completely bhand hote hue dekhna h, I missed that and with that I missed some your secrets too, although mjhe sources se pata chal gaye. xD You are an amazing person, wish you all the good things in life. Stay Blessed! See ya soon! Till then, HAIL HYDRA!
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Roomies for life! Bro kya time tha wo. Bhot maje kiye the apan. From playing games, sleeping a lot, not attending the classes and getting deregistered in the same course, it was a hell lot of experiences and mostly amazing ones. I still remember the medical certificate shit we tried in between our midsem exam. xD I wish they call us back to the campus soon and we can enjoy at least one more semester together.
author: Naman  Roshan

text: It is difficult to imagine my 4 years at IITK without you as you are present everywhere, may be missing only in the first few months of the first year. You are an incredible person, bhot maje kiye h hamne and I really liked your school time stories and believe me it‚Äôs not over yet between you and her. üòâ I am pretty sure ki mess menu wali gossip to tu kabhi nahi bhulega. Last monthly was really amazing, while writing this I am realizing those days were so beautiful! Tu hi mjhe har basketball match k liye le jata tha, I really enjoyed playing basketball with you and I will definitely gonna miss them. I wish you qualify UPSC soon and all your dreams come true. Let‚Äôs meet soon and we all will go for a long trip! Cya!
author: Naman  Roshan

text: We definitely talked a lot, some of them can be considered as arguments tho! Kya kya likhu, it is very difficult to pick auctually. xD We actually tried so many things together, from going gym, following keto diet, playing basketball, discussing about preparation, going to canteen for masala Maggi, watching every IPL match and your insane commentaries, we do share a lot of memories. Although covid ne last year destroy kr diya, but even in that one month, bhot maza aaya. Wish you all the best for your ambitions and stay in touch!
author: Naman  Roshan

text: Bhai tu bhot mast banda h. I remember right from Day 1, tu kafi energetic, enthusiastic and positive tha. May be influential too! It is always nice discussing with you on anything. Bhot accha insaan h tu and you always do give good advice to people.  Wish you all the best for your ambitions and aise hi chaapte rahna. Stay in touch and I hope we meet again soon.
author: Naman  Roshan
